translation.en: [man 1] Gunther, Bola,
thank you for joining us here in our bubble.
translation.de: danke, dass ihr hier in unserer Blase seid.

translation.en: As the producer on this movie, here's what I expect from you.
translation.de: Als Produzent dieses Films erwarte ich Folgendes von euch:

translation.en: -Actors are animals. -[woman scoffs]
You are animal handlers.
Sometimes, they wanna play with you. Sometimes, they'll rip your balls off.
translation.de: Mal spielen sie mit euch, mal reißen sie euch die Eier ab.

translation.en: Don't listen to anything they say. They're liars.
translation.de: Glaubt ihnen kein Wort. Sie sind Lügner.

translation.en: They literally lie for a living. That's their literal job, yeah?
translation.de: Dafür werden sie bezahlt. Das ist ihr Beruf.

translation.en: Don't party with them.
Don't tire them out.
Don't fuck them.
I won't.
Always tell them they're fantastic in the movie.
translation.de: Sagt ihnen immer, sie würden fantastisch spielen.

translation.en: They're very insecure people. They need constant praise.
translation.de: Sie sind unsichere Menschen. Sie brauchen ständig Lob.

translation.en: Make them feel good. Don't tire them out. Don't fuck them. Don't fuck them.
translation.de: Sie loben. Sie nicht müde machen. Nicht mit ihnen ficken.

translation.en: -[man 1] That's it. -That's it.
Any questions?
Um… Yeah, like, what if we become proper friends?
translation.de: Ja. Was, wenn wir uns anfreunden?

translation.en: -You won't. -[man 2] No?
No.
What if they confide in you and tell you something they've not told anybody else?
translation.de: Und wenn sie uns etwas anvertrauen, das sie noch keinem gesagt haben?

translation.en: Call me, tell me what they said.
-What if they say, "Don't tell Gavin"? -[Gavin] No!
-No. -This is the bubble.
The sanctuary!
It's the only place they're safe! That's why you're not wearing masks.
translation.de: Nur hier sind sie sicher! Darum tragt ihr keine Masken.

translation.en: Don't you get it?
-[woman laughing] How are you? -So good to see you!
-Well, imagine… -[woman] Okay, yes.
-Fake hug. -[man] Oh, wow. You look fantastic!
translation.de: -Wir tun nur so. -Du siehst toll aus!

translation.en: [woman] Thanks. Been exercising a lot. It's the only thing keeping me sane.
translation.de: Danke. Ich trainiere viel. Sonst werde ich verrückt.

translation.en: Well, you look sane and gorgeous, and, uh…
translation.de: Du wirkst nicht verrückt, siehst toll aus, und…

translation.en: -What do you think about Cliff Beasts 6? -I can't leave my boyfriend right now.
translation.de: -Was hältst du von Cliff Beasts 6? -Mein Freund braucht mich jetzt.

translation.en: He is very neurotic, and this whole time is just very triggering for him.
translation.de: Er ist sehr neurotisch. Diese Zeiten sind heikel für ihn.

translation.en: Huh. Okay. What if you brought him?
translation.de: Okay. Und wenn du ihn mitbringst?

translation.en: -He won't travel. -Because of the pandemic?
No, he just won't fly. He also refuses to get a job.
translation.de: Nein, er fliegt nicht. Und will nicht arbeiten.

translation.en: I have a lot of clients working in bubbles right now, and they're having a blast.
translation.de: Viele meiner Kunden arbeiten gerade in Blasen und sind begeistert.

translation.en: It won't be comfortable working with them.
They hate me for not doing Cliff Beasts 5. I can't bubble with them for three months.
translation.de: Cliff Beasts 5 nicht gemacht habe. Drei Monate Blase mit denen geht nicht.

translation.en: I'm gonna level with you.
You need a rebound after your last film, Jerusalem Rising.
translation.de: Du musst dich von deinem letzten Film erholen.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -You saw the reviews.
-I never read my reviews. -Hang on a sec.
-Can you not read those? -Just listen, okay?
"Jerusalem Rising manages to offend both Palestinians and Jews."
translation.de: "Jerusalem Rising gelingt es, Juden und Palästinenser aufzubringen."

translation.en: That's one review. And it was the script. It wasn't my fault.
translation.de: Das ist nur eine Kritik. Und es lag am Drehbuch, nicht an mir.

translation.en: When Cats bombed, they didn't blame Andrew Lloyd Webber.
translation.de: Als Cats floppte, kritisierte keiner Lloyd Webber.

translation.en: They just said, "Judi Dench fucked Cats."
translation.de: Es hieß: "Judi Dench hat Cats ruiniert."

translation.en: Okay, but you were the one who told me
I could play half-Israeli and half-Palestinian when I'm neither.
translation.de: "Spiel eine palästinensische Israeli", obwohl ich beides nicht bin.

translation.en: [in ambiguous accent] I know you've been fighting for thousands of years,
translation.de: Ich weiß, ihr streitet seit Tausenden von Jahren,

translation.en: but tonight, we must join forces to fight the aliens.
translation.de: aber heute müssen wir gemeinsam gegen die Aliens kämpfen.

translation.en: [in normal accent] Is my career dead?
Not if you make this movie.
And it's safe?
The safest place in the world right now is a film set.
translation.de: Nirgendwo ist man zurzeit so sicher wie an einem Filmset.

translation.en: The script is actually good?
It made me cry.
Oh, you're making the face like you're gonna say yes.
translation.de: Ich sehe dir an, dass du gleich Ja sagst.

translation.en: Oh, my God, Josh is gonna have a full nervous breakdown. I can do this, right?
translation.de: Oh Gott. Josh wird einen Anfall bekommen. Okay, ich kann das.

translation.en: I'll keep my head down, not get pulled into the drama,
translation.de: Ich halte mich aus jedem Theater raus,

translation.en: and just do my job and get out.
translation.de: tue nur meinen Job und bin weg.

translation.en: All right. Okay, let's do it. Yeah, put me in the bubble.
translation.de: Gut. Machen wir es. In die Blase mit mir.

translation.en: -[Carol] Hi! -[man 2] Carol. What's up, movie star?
This is so crazy. You sure you're gonna be okay?
translation.de: Das ist verrückt. Kommst du wirklich klar?

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, I guess I'm just worried about catching the virus, but…
translation.de: Ja. Ich habe Angst vor dem Virus, aber…

translation.en: Well, just call me regularly.
Actually, I just heard that veterinarians are gonna start treating people,
translation.de: Ich hab gehört, dass Leute bald von Tierärzten behandelt werden.

translation.en: so that'll help.
Yeah, and it's only three months. Three months! We can do this!
translation.de: Ja, und es sind nur drei Monate. Wir schaffen das!

translation.en: Oh, wait! Somebody wants to say hi!
Look who it is!
I miss you so much, Mommy.
Aw. I'm not your mommy yet, Leila,
translation.de: Ich bin noch nicht deine Mami.

translation.en: but I will be your stepmom one day. It'll be the best!
translation.de: Aber ich werde deine Stiefmutter. Das wird super!

translation.en: -Daddy said you left us for dead. -Oh, what?
-[laughs] Don't forget about us! Bye! -Bye!
-[Carol] Hey! Nice to meet you! -Hiya! I'm Pippa, production coordinator.
Oh. Shall we? [chuckles] Welcome to Clifton House.
translation.de: Wollen wir? Willkommen in Clifton House.

translation.en: -[Carol] This is amazing. -[Pippa] I know, right?
-Carol, we're so excited you're here! -[Carol] I'm so excited to get started!
translation.de: Carol, toll, dass du hier bist! Toll, dass es losgeht!

translation.en: -[Gavin] Wow! You look great. -[Carol] Oh, thank you.
-Now, you just have to do a COVID test. -[Carol] Okay.
-[Gunther] I'm such a big fan. -[Carol] Thank you. [chuckles]
[Gunther] And in your nose. Okay.
-[Carol] Mm. -[Gunther] Ready? One hundred.
Ninety-nine.
-Ninety-eight. -Uh…
-I'm only joking. -Oh!
-[chuckling] Oh, my God! You're the worst! -[Gunther] See you in a bit. Bye, friend.
translation.de: -Oh Gott. Du bist schrecklich! -Bis gleich. Tschüs.

translation.en: [Carol] Bye. Whoo! Yeah.
Um, so how does the quarantining work?
translation.de: Wie läuft das mit der Quarantäne?

translation.en: It's a quick 14 days. We pamper you.
translation.de: Es sind kurze zwei Wochen. Wir verwöhnen dich.

translation.en: Wait till you see what we've done to your room.
translation.de: Wart's ab, bis du dein Zimmer siehst.

translation.en: -[Pippa] You have the best room by far. -[Carol] I love that.
-Ah! Bola! -[Bola] Hello.
This is Bola, our wellness specialist. Bola, how would you describe yourself?
translation.de: Das ist Bola, unser Wellness-Experte. Bola, wie würdest du dich beschreiben?

translation.en: Uh, well, due to safety, we don't have a lot of staff, so I get to do everything.
translation.de: Aus Sicherheitsgründen haben wir nicht viel Personal, also mache ich alles.

translation.en: Which means if you need a personal trainer, Bola.
translation.de: Brauchst du einen Personal Trainer? Bola.

translation.en: If you need a yoga teacher, Bola.
If you need a ping-pong opponent, Bola. If you need a masseuse?
translation.de: Oder einen Gegner für Pingpong? Bola. Oder eine Masseurin?

translation.en: -[Carol] Bola! -[Bola] That's it, baby girl.
[man] We allowed to smoke weed in the room? I forgot to bring my edibles.
translation.de: Ist Kiffen erlaubt? Ich hab meine Edibles vergessen.

translation.en: [Carol] Oh, my God! Howie, how are you?
-[Howie] Carol, come here, my love! -[man 1] Stop! That's it. Stop it!
-[man 2] Off you go. -[Howie] What the fuck is going on?
-Brother, help me! -[Carol] Howie?
Give it two weeks, and you'll have all the hugs you need.
translation.de: In zwei Wochen bekommst du alle Umarmungen, die du brauchst.

translation.en: [Bola] Reception area.
[Carol sighs] Now, this is beautiful.
[Bola] Of course! Top of the line for top-of-the-line talent.
translation.de: Na klar! Nur das Beste für die besten Schauspieler.

translation.en: [Bola] There you are.
[Carol gasps] This is nice!
[Bola] Good. See you in two weeks.
She loves you! And you're the prime minister!
translation.de: Sie liebt dich! Und du bist der Premierminister!

translation.en: Am I your bitch now?
That's what you get for fucking with her mission!
translation.de: So ist das, wenn man ihr in die Quere kommt!

translation.en: [groans] This is too much for anyone to take!
Hey, Carol Cobb.
Your quarantine is over. [chuckles]
Uh, the cocktail party starts in one hour, okay?
translation.de: Die Cocktailparty beginnt in einer Stunde, ja?

translation.en: Please shower before you come.
It stinks in here.
-Jesus Christ. -[door closes]
-This is so exciting. -[man] Hmm.
It's like my movie posters have come to life.
translation.de: Als wären meine Filmplakate lebendig geworden.

translation.en: Yeah, you will soon learn to hate these people.
translation.de: Ja. Bald wirst du diese Leute hassen.

translation.en: You abandoned us.
translation.de: Du hast uns im Stich gelassen.

translation.en: I am mad at you. Back away.
translation.de: Ich bin sauer auf dich. Verschwinde.

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
translation.de: Tut mir leid. Es tut mir sehr leid.

translation.en: -Are you? -[Carol] I am.
I should have done the movie. I shouldn't have bailed.
translation.de: Ich hätte den Film machen sollen. Abzuhauen war falsch.

translation.en: I'm an idiot.
I missed you so much. I did.
-You did? -Yeah.
Sorry. Had to get that off my chest.
Yeah, give it to me. [chuckles]
And I really liked you in Jerusalem Rising.
translation.de: Und ich fand dich gut in Jerusalem Rising.

translation.en: -[woman] Yeah. -Really?
That means so much coming from you.
translation.de: Es ist echt toll, dass du das sagst.

translation.en: And I think that all of the critics around the world are wrong.
translation.de: Und all die Kritiker auf der ganzen Welt irren sich.

translation.en: Oh, not everyone.
Four percent on Rotten Tomatoes. [scoffs]
It doesn't really go lower.
So I need cool, documentary-style footage.
translation.de: Ich will coole Aufnahmen im Doku-Stil.

translation.en: If the actors ask for air, give them air, but then strike and get what we need.
translation.de: Wenn die Darsteller ihre Ruhe wollen, lass sie ihnen, aber dann schlag zu.

translation.en: I want you to be a fly on the wall,
translation.de: Sei eine Fliege an der Wand,

translation.en: but also up their arse.
translation.de: aber geh ihnen auch auf den Sack.

translation.en: -Now, fuck off, Lee. -My name is Scott, actually.
-I don't care. -Okay.
You a big Cliff Beasts fan?
translation.de: Bist du Fan von Cliff Beasts?

translation.en: No, but I saw the trailer for the second one. It was so cool!
translation.de: Nein, aber den Trailer für den zweiten Film fand ich cool.

translation.en: Hi, y'all!
Excited for Cliff Beasts?
[whispers] Is this the movie?
[Scott hesitates] What?
Are we shooting right now?
No, it's just behind-the-scenes stuff.
Just say, like, a sentence about why you're excited?
translation.de: Sag uns in einem Satz, warum du dich freust.

translation.en: I'm sorry. You're gonna have to talk to my mom if you wanna talk to me.
translation.de: Sie müssen meine Mutter fragen, wenn Sie mit mir reden wollen.

translation.en: Oh, all right.
-It's nice meeting you. -Okay, you too.
-[woman] Dieter! Hi! -Hi.
Lauren. Um…
I just wanted to tell you how incredible you were in Hunger Strike.
translation.de: Ich wollte dir nur sagen: Du warst genial in Hunger Strike.

translation.en: Your performance was…
I mean, I think about it all the time. Just fearless and a total triumph.
translation.de: Ich denke ständig daran. Einfach furchtlos, ein echter Triumph.

translation.en: Um… Congratulations.
I don't watch my own shit. Never watch your own shit.
translation.de: Ich schau mir nie meine eigene Kacke an.

translation.en: You just wipe, you flush, and you move on.
Right. Well, anyway, I just wanted to let you know that it really stuck with me,
translation.de: Ja. Egal, ich wollte dir nur sagen, dass ich echt hingerissen war.

translation.en: and it was very powerful. Just…
Yeah. Where's your husband?
My husband? We got divorced.
Of course.
[Dieter] I'm sorry.
No worries. It's… We're fine.
We are, uh… totally fine.
We have gone through a lot, and we are coming out on the other side.
translation.de: Wir haben viel durchgemacht, und jetzt haben wir es überwunden.

translation.en: Right.
Our main priority is our 16-year-old son,
translation.de: Wichtig ist uns jetzt unser 16-jähriger Sohn,

translation.en: who we just adopted right before the divorce.
translation.de: den wir kurz vor der Scheidung adoptiert haben.

translation.en: Listen, I'm sorry, I'm trying to care, but it's hard.
translation.de: Ich versuche mitzufühlen, aber es ist schwierig.

translation.en: Gunther, I like you.
Really? I like you too. I think you're… Okay, 'cause…
translation.de: Echt? Ich dich auch. Ich finde dich… Okay…

translation.en: That feels amazing,
'cause we got told we weren't allowed to be friends with the cast.
translation.de: Es hieß, wir dürften uns nicht mit Darstellern anfreunden.

translation.en: Who said that?
I don't wanna be a person that's like, "It was Gavin," but, yeah.
translation.de: Ich will nicht der sein, der sagt: "Gavin war es." Aber, ja.

translation.en: Know how I feel about that?
translation.de: Weißt du, was? Fick dich, Gavin!

translation.en: -Fuck you, Gavin! -Do you?
Suck your mum, Gavin! Say it from your chest.
translation.de: Fick deine Mutter, Gavin! Lass es raus.

translation.en: What? [mumbles] Fuck you, Gavin!
I need to be real with you. I don't understand these bullshit rules.
translation.de: Ehrlich, ich verstehe diese schwachsinnigen Regeln nicht.

translation.en: Been in my room two weeks. I ain't had human contact.
translation.de: Ich war zwei Wochen ohne menschlichen Kontakt.

translation.en: It's important for my mental and physical health to have human contact with friends.
translation.de: Es ist wichtig für Seele und Körper, Kontakt zu Freunden zu haben.

translation.en: -We're friends! -Completely.
-What will happen if I touch you? Huh? -We could die.
translation.de: -Was, wenn ich dich berühre? -Wir könnten sterben.

translation.en: Yeah, completely. It's kind of the situation.
-Yeah. -Boop!
-Um-- -Did we die? Are you dead?
translation.de: Sind wir tot? Bist du tot?

translation.en: You've just got to understand that my job, as a health officer,
translation.de: Du musst verstehen, dass ich als Gesundheitsbeauftragter

translation.en: is to make sure that everything that we're doing is as safe as possible.
translation.de: dafür sorgen muss, dass unser Verhalten möglichst sicher ist.

translation.en: All the best, Gunther.
-Um, my dad does stunts. -Hi.
Um, I'm lonely, and I'm in hell here,
translation.de: Ich bin einsam, und für mich ist das hier die Hölle.

translation.en: and I would like to form an alliance with you.
translation.de: Ich möchte mich mit dir verbünden.

translation.en: [hesitates] Okay, yeah, sure.
All right, okay.
It was hard doing the last one without you.
translation.de: Es war schwer, den Film ohne dich zu machen.

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I'm sorry. I got really bad advice from my reps
translation.de: Es tut mir leid. Mein Agent hat mich schlecht beraten, und ich war psychisch angeschlagen.

translation.en: and was also having some, ahem, emotional issues.
translation.de: Mein Agent hat mich schlecht beraten, und ich war psychisch angeschlagen.

translation.en: That's where you were on your journey, and it brought you right back here.
translation.de: Das war dein Weg, und er führte dich zurück hierher.

translation.en: -[Carol] Exactly. -It's all good.
-I heard you were starting a religion. -No, it's a… [chuckles nervously]
translation.de: -Ich hörte, du gründest eine Religion. -Nein, das ist…

translation.en: It's a lifestyle brand slash motivational system called Harmony Ignite.
translation.de: Eine Lifestyle-Marke und Motivationshilfe namens Harmonie-Starter.

translation.en: Wow. And you wrote a whole Bible.
translation.de: Und du hast eine Bibel geschrieben.

translation.en: Well, I wrote a book. A book called Harmony Ignited.
And, uh, it's just a collection of my thoughts and musings
and some sayings and wisdom and proverbs. That's it, yeah.
translation.de: und einige Sprichwörter und Weisheiten. Das ist alles.

translation.en: It's not a religion, per se. You can leave anytime that you want to.
translation.de: Es ist keine echte Religion. Man kann jederzeit austreten.

translation.en: -It's not, like, a cult. -No, it's definitely not a cult.
translation.de: -Es ist keine Sekte. -Nein, auf keinen Fall.

translation.en: I mean, who defines what a cult is?
-Yeah. -Okay.
You know what? I'm gonna be really straightforward with you right now
translation.de: Ich werde jetzt ganz ehrlich zu dir sein.

translation.en: and let you know that we are co-parents to Raphael, and that is it.
translation.de: Wir beide sind die Eltern von Raphael, mehr nicht.

translation.en: That's true.
So what happened on parts one and three and four is not happening again.
translation.de: Es passiert nicht wieder das Gleiche wie beim ersten, dritten und vierten Film.

translation.en: What about what we did on part two?
You have no respect for me. I have nothing but respect for you.
translation.de: -Du respektierst mich nicht. -Ich respektiere dich sehr.

translation.en: Stop.
Stop.
-Stop it. -Stop.
I would appreciate if you didn't look at me like that.
translation.de: Bitte schau mich nicht so an.

translation.en: -Where should I look? -I can't look at you.
-I'm still here though. -[sighs]
I know you.
-God. Hi. -[laughs]
-How are you doing? Sorry to scare you. -Don't worry.
I am so excited that you are here.
translation.de: Es ist so toll, dass du hier bist.

translation.en: Oh, yeah. No, I'm so excited.
Gotta tell you, I love the TikTok stuff.
You are crushing it. Absolutely crushing it.
I mean, clearly. 120 million followers. You are unbelievable.
translation.de: Echt. 120 Millionen Follower. Du bist unglaublich.

translation.en: I love the one where you and your cat lip-synch to Harry Potter.
translation.de: Das Harry-Potter-Video mit dir und deiner Katze ist toll.

translation.en: I can't believe you've seen all that.
translation.de: Irre, du hast das alles gesehen.

translation.en: [laughs] It's fantastic! Hey, maybe you and I can do one together while we're here.
translation.de: Das ist super! Vielleicht könnten wir in der Zeit hier zusammen eins machen.

translation.en: -Oh, yeah, maybe. -Yeah.
-What's your name? -Carla.
Nice to meet you. You got great energy about you.
translation.de: Freut mich. Du hast eine tolle Ausstrahlung.

translation.en: Who is that?
One of the actors. He's not that good though.
translation.de: Einer der Schauspieler. Kein sehr guter.

translation.en: -[piano music playing] -May I refresh your water?
Yeah, please.
Thanks.
Why you look at me with weird eyes? [chuckles]
translation.de: Warum schauen Sie mich so seltsam an?

translation.en: -Jesus fucking Christ. -Wow.
-[Gavin] Okay. -Hit us with it, Gav.
Welcome! I'm gonna introduce somebody now who is…
translation.de: Willkommen! Ich stelle euch nun jemanden vor, der…

translation.en: He's special.
He's funny.
He's extremely intelligent.
And he's a…
He's a visionary.
He shot a brilliant movie called Tiles of Love while working at Home Depot.
translation.de: Er drehte den genialen Tiles of Love, während er im Baumarkt arbeitete.

translation.en: -Our director… Darren Eigen! -[cheering]
-[whistling] Whoo! -Thank you! Thanks, you guys. Uh…
I just wanna say
I am so lucky to be able to work with a cast this talented.
translation.de: Mit so talentierten Schauspielern arbeiten zu können, ist ein Glück.

translation.en: This is your car,
and I'm gonna step in and take the wheel.
translation.de: Und ich steige ein und übernehme das Steuer.

translation.en: This drive is gonna be a little crazy.
Gonna head towards the railing a couple of times. Might hit it.
translation.de: Ab und zu fährt er gegen die Leitplanke.

translation.en: Some of you might not even survive.
But I've got the end of the road in my sight.
translation.de: Aber ich sehe das Ende der Strecke.

translation.en: Might be a crazy ride,
but it's gonna look great,
and it's gonna make the world forget all their problems.
translation.de: Es wird der Welt helfen, alle Probleme zu vergessen.

translation.en: So, let's go for a ride.
We're fucked.
Are you sure it's safe?
Just don't put your hands too close to your face.
translation.de: Die Hände nicht zu nah ans Gesicht.

translation.en: -[squawking] -[nervously] Oh, shit. Aah!
No! No! No!
-[Darren] Grab. Nice. Right arm. Block. -[grunting]
translation.de: Zupacken. Schön. Rechter Arm, Block. Gut.

translation.en: Move around. Good. Let me hear the rage. Aah. Spins around, kick. Great.
translation.de: Drehung. Gut. Lass deine Wut hören. Dreht sich, Tritt. Toll.

translation.en: [trainer] Get him, boy. Get him!
Heart shot! Yeah!
Dick shot!
[trainer] Over.
[Howie] Oi! And roll.
[trainer] Rusty, come! Come on, boy!
Can you train him to peck off Dustin's balls?
translation.de: Kann man ihm beibringen, Dustin die Eier abzufressen?

translation.en: I'm just kidding.
But can you? [laughing]
Gavin, how are you?
Hi! [chuckles] How are you doing?
Oh, good. I just wanted to say, uh, good luck,
translation.de: STUDIOCHEFIN Gut. Ich wollte dir Glück wünschen.

translation.en: and we love you, and we're counting on you.
translation.de: Wir lieben dich und zählen auf dich.

translation.en: I know. I'm on it.
You are such a hero for keeping the lights on at the studio.
translation.de: Du bist ein Held. Dank dir läuft das Studio weiter.

translation.en: This lockdown has been so hard on all of us.
translation.de: Dieser Lockdown war für uns alle so schwierig.

translation.en: But you're skiing?
Yeah, well, this was the only country that was open. Thank God I got my shot.
translation.de: Ja, das war das einzige offene Land. Zum Glück bin ich geimpft.

translation.en: [chuckles] Did you? I thought they weren't available for six months.
translation.de: Echt? Ich dachte, das ginge erst in sechs Monaten.

translation.en: Oh, they're not. Not for normal people, but I'm with rich people.
translation.de: Das gilt für normale Leute, nicht für Reiche wie uns.

translation.en: Don't hate the player, hate the game. Ugh! I hate the game.
translation.de: Hasse nicht den Spieler, hasse das Spiel. Ich hasse es.

translation.en: Anyway, have a great shoot.
translation.de: Egal. Ich wünsche dir tolle Dreharbeiten.

translation.en: I love you. I'm in love with you.
translation.de: Ich bewundere dich. Ich liebe dich.

translation.en: And do not fuck me!
translation.de: Und bau mir bloß keinen Scheiß!

translation.en: So the thing about Harmony Ignite is it's about dreams.
translation.de: Bei Harmonie-Starter geht es um Träume.

translation.en: It's about how you go about fulfilling your dreams.
translation.de: Es geht darum, wie man seine Träume wahr macht.

translation.en: I'm not really looking for a new religion.
translation.de: Ich suche eigentlich keine neue Religion.

translation.en: I'm Hindu. Many gods, very busy.
translation.de: Ich bin Hindu. Viele Götter, viel zu tun.
